text: Oleksandra Vyacheslavivna Matviichuk (; born 8 October 1983) is a Ukrainian human rights lawyer and civil society. She is in charge of the non-profit organization Centre for Civil Liberties. She is an activist for democratic reforms in Ukraine and the OSCE region. In 2022, she is awarded Right Livelihood Award with Centre for Civil Liberties. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1983 births Category:Ukrainian lawyers Category:Ukrainian human rights activists
title: Oleksandra Matviichuk
